categories: Category:Missions of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, Commander Lina Graf of the Rebel Alliance embarked on a mission to Fortress Vader on Mustafar to rescue Rebel Lieutenant Thom Hudd who was being held prisoner by Vaneé in the fortress. Lina impersonated an Inquisitor to infiltrate the castle, and after a brief fight with Vaneé, managed to rescue Hudd and escape the planet.
